original_text: And you shall let none of it remain until the morning; anything that remains until the morning you shall burn.
korean_text: 아침까지 남겨두지 말며 아침까지 남은 것은 곧 불사르라

sentences.original_text: And you shall let none of it remain until the morning
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 그것 중 아무것도 아침까지 남겨두지 말라

sentences.original_text: anything that remains until the morning you shall burn
